Paul: You have a reprieve from me writing about last night’s debacle to join in the four things geekary… I’ve been tagged by Lloydy so it would seam I have to do the same, kind of like a blog chain letter, but without the threat of spiritual violence. Hang on your collective asses cos here we go… Four jobs i’ve had in my life

  • Petrol Station Attendant
  • Working at The Terrace Restaurant
  • Working in a box factory
  • Web designer

Four films I can watch over and over- Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi - Contact - Big Fish - The Man with Two Brains

Four places I have lived- Walsall - Huddersfield - That’s pretty much it…

Four TV shows I love to watch- The Simpson’s - Futurama - Family Guy (is there a pattern emerging here?) - The News (on the BBC naturally)

Four places I have been on holiday- Austria - Spain - USA - France

Four of my favorite foods- Mum’s Sunday lunch - Spag. Bol. - Curry mate - Sausages!

Four Websites I visit Daily- Flickr - BBC - Homestarrunner - Google

Four places I would rather be right now- With friends - Travelling - Travelling some more - Settled (guess this one is more an emotional place)

Four Bloggers I am tagging- Paul (back at ya) - Steve Smith - Benedict Eastaugh - Other friends who I know have blogs, but I can’t remeber the address! Consider yourself tagged.
